summary: Love, loss and hope are tumultuously explored amidst a tranquil backdrop and asks us all the question: What is your dream?
cast: Ben Weaver|Karmine Alers|S. Lue McWilliams|Ryan Vigilant|Sturgis Adams|John Challice
keywords: cancer|gay|mother daughter relationship|mother son relationship|family relationships
title: Naked As We Came
